Operation 'search_posts' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Original summary is too generic. Description references 'listing posts' without explaining what that means, lacks clarity on what search parameters do, and doesn't explain the return format. Enhanced version specifies search capabilities, clarifies parameter usage, explains the 1,000-post limit with actionable guidance, and describes the response structure for better AI agent understanding.

data.current_description:
Searching posts takes the same arguments as listing posts except for the addition of the search and sort_by parameters.
NOTE: When paging through the posts returned by this endpoint, there will be at most 1,000 posts that can be returned (eg. 50 pages worth of posts with the default per_page value of 20).  In areas where there are more than 1,000 posts, clients can use more specific query parameters to adjust which posts are returned.
data.summary_suggestion: Search posts by keyword and filters
data.description_suggestion: Search for posts across all groups using keyword search and filtering parameters. Accepts the same filtering arguments as list posts (location, groups, post types, etc.) plus additional search and sort_by parameters for query refinement. Returns paginated results with a maximum of 1,000 posts per search (use more specific filters to narrow results in high-volume areas). Each result includes post details such as title, description, type (offer/wanted/admin), and posting user information.
data.reasoning: Original summary is too generic. Description references 'listing posts' without explaining what that means, lacks clarity on what search parameters do, and doesn't explain the return format. Enhanced version specifies search capabilities, clarifies parameter usage, explains the 1,000-post limit with actionable guidance, and describes the response structure for better AI agent understanding.

message: Operation 'get_post' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details, missing_context. Summary is clear and action-oriented. Description is completely empty, providing no context about what data is returned or when to use this endpoint. Added description explaining the return structure and use case for AI agent clarity.

data.description_suggestion: Retrieve a single post by its ID. Returns the complete post object including title, description, type (offer/wanted/admin), status, location, posting user information, and associated group details. Use this endpoint when you need full details about a specific post.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear and action-oriented. Description is completely empty, providing no context about what data is returned or when to use this endpoint. Added description explaining the return structure and use case for AI agent clarity.

message: Operation 'get_user_posts' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details, missing_context. Summary is clear and action-oriented. Description is empty, missing information about filtering capabilities, pagination, return format, and use cases. Added description explaining available filters, pagination support, and when to use this endpoint for AI agent interpretability.

data.description_suggestion: Retrieve a paginated list of posts created by a specific user. Supports filtering by post type (offer/wanted/admin), status, groups, and other parameters. Returns post summaries with pagination support. Use this endpoint to view all posts from a particular user or to filter their posts by specific criteria.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear and action-oriented. Description is empty, missing information about filtering capabilities, pagination, return format, and use cases. Added description explaining available filters, pagination support, and when to use this endpoint for AI agent interpretability.

message: Operation 'search_user_posts' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Summary is clear and specific. Description is too vague and references 'listing posts' without explanation. Enhanced version clarifies what search parameters are available, explains the return format, and provides context for when to use this endpoint versus the list endpoint.

data.current_description: Searching posts takes the same arguments as listing posts except for the addition of the search and sort_by parameters.
data.description_suggestion: Search for posts created by a specific user using keyword search and filtering parameters. Accepts the same filtering arguments as listing user posts (post type, status, groups, etc.) plus additional search and sort_by parameters for query refinement. Returns paginated results of matching posts with full post details. Use this endpoint to find specific posts from a user by keyword or to retrieve sorted results.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear and specific. Description is too vague and references 'listing posts' without explanation. Enhanced version clarifies what search parameters are available, explains the return format, and provides context for when to use this endpoint versus the list endpoint.

message: Operation 'search_groups' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_context, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, poor_ai_interpretability. Original summary is too generic. Description is completely missing, making it impossible for AI agents to understand what inputs are expected, what the operation returns, or how to use the 9 parameters. data.current_description:
NOTE: When paging through the posts returned by this endpoint, there will be at most 1,000 posts that can be returned (eg. 50 pages worth of posts with the default per_page value of 20).  In areas where there are more than 1,000 posts, clients can use more specific query parameters to adjust which posts are returned.
NOTE: Passing the latitude, longitude and radius parameters filters all posts by their location and so these parameters will temporarily override the current users' location preferences. When latitude, longitude and radius are not specified, public posts will be filtered by the current users' location preferences.
data.summary_suggestion: Search and filter posts with location and preferences
data.description_suggestion: Retrieve a paginated list of posts (offers, wanted, or admin posts) filtered by user preferences and optional location parameters. Supports filtering by latitude, longitude, radius, post type, and other criteria. Maximum 1,000 posts can be returned per request; use specific query parameters to narrow results in high-volume areas. Location parameters override user location preferences when specified. Returns Post objects sorted by relevance. Default pagination is 20 posts per page.
